section.title: Example: Getting Data from a List Control

description.p: The *[js:target]* parameter can be a zero-based row number or a string representing the value returned by the List. For example, if the List is configured to return values from a 'Lastname' column, target could be set to 'Smith' to get data for the record with a 'Lastname' of 'Smith'.

The example below demonstrates getting data from a List Control in a UX Component. The first example uses the value returned by the List control to get the data. The second shows getting the data using the zero-based row number.
